column5: Hi! This is a 4 bedroom home with high-speed Internet and 4 beds capable of having up to 10 family members over for the weekend. House will not be available to larger groups during the week but able to accommodate 1 or 2 med students or residents/healthcare professionals... from the scott and white hospital - Just did maps for it and 2.2 miles from hospital or 13 minutes on the bike or 6 min drive
